name: Connection Center
description:
This game was made for a local 24 hour GameJam in my school

Take on a role of a call center emloyee!

Get requests from callers and create connections by plugging the wires in the right ports! You can use up to 3 wires at a time, but will that be enough to satisfy everybody?

Basics

Your job is to connect 2 ports by the caller's request with a wire.  To find the correct port, you'll have to look through the phone book to find the correct port to route the call. You'll get points by completing requests, and staying in your position long enough. You'll get fired when you have too many requests on hold.

I also kinda sorta almost ran out of time so I had to use Hungarian names, sorry :(
Also also, I only tested the game on 2 resolutions, 1920x1080 and 1440x900
